location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Rawdon Chesney, Commander of the Euphrates Expedition, to Samuel Hennell, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, Francis Rawdon Chesney, Commander of the Euphrates Expedition, writes to Samuel Hennell, Bushire, informing him that the Governor in Council has sanctioned the expense of tombstones for the deceased men of the Euphrates expedition. He then gives instructions for one to be placed over the man who died at Bushire, bearing the accompanying inscription. The inscription is included at the end of the letter.
